titles.title: Expressing support for the month of September as "Founding Fathers' Month".
Expressing support for the month of September as "Founding Fathers' Month".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports a Founding Fathersâ€™ Month as a time to reflect on the sacrifices made by the Founding Fathers and to commit to preserving the freedoms they fought to establish for future generations.
